item.title: Welcome To Bold Pastel
item.description: What is Bold Pastel We make applications for popular tools. We do it because we enjoy making good software that make an impact. We are unpretentious. By seeking and blundering we learn. And so when we make creative software, it will not be for want of boldness but because of it. Attempting to make epic software, one bit at a time, standing on the shoulder of giants. What do we do?
